heading: HR00801
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE GOVERNMENT FINANCIAL AND PRIVATE FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS TO GRANT AND EXTEND AVAILABLE CREDITS TO SMALL BUSINESS OWNERS, SELF-EMPLOYED INDIVIDUALS AND FARMERS TO REDUCE THE EFFECT OF THE RESTRICTED MOVEMENT OF PEOPLE AND GOODS DUE TO CORONAVIRUS DISEASE (COVID 19) OUTBREAK WITH THE PRESIDENTIAL PROCLAMATION 992, s. 2020, DECLARING A STATE OF PUBLIC HEALTH EMERGENCY ALL OVER THE PHILIPPINES AND THE PASSAGE OF R.A. 11469 KNOWN AS BAYANIHAN TO HEAL AS ONE ACT
status: Pending with the Committee on BANKS AND FINANCIAL INTERMEDIARIES since 2020-05-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00801
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE GOVERNMENT FINANCIAL AND PRIVATE FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS TO GRANT AND EXTEND AVAILABLE CREDITS TO SMALL BUSINESS OWNERS, SELF-EMPLOYED INDIVIDUALS AND FARMERS TO REDUCE THE EFFECT OF THE RESTRICTED MOVEMENT OF PEOPLE AND GOODS DUE TO CORONAVIRUS DISEASE (COVID 19) OUTBREAK WITH THE PRESIDENTIAL PROCLAMATION 992, s. 2020, DECLARING A STATE OF PUBLIC HEALTH EMERGENCY ALL OVER THE PHILIPPINES AND THE PASSAGE OF R.A. 11469 KNOWN AS BAYANIHAN TO HEAL AS ONE ACT
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SAKALURAN, PRINCESS RIHAN M.
DATE FILED : 2020-04-27
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BANKS AND FINANCIAL INTERMEDIARIES ON 2020-05-04
